subject: AI & Agents
title: Style Transfer: Painting Like the Masters
description: A micro-lesson that makes Style Transfer: Painting Like the Masters usable.

hook.text: Upload a photo. Choose Van Gogh's style. Watch your selfie become a swirling starry night portrait.

buildup.text: Style transfer separates content from style and applies one image's style to another's content.

discovery.text: A CNN extracts high-level style features (brushstrokes, colors) and applies them to your image.

twist.text: The model doesn't understand art. It matches statistical texture patterns between images.

climax.text: Apps like Prisma made style transfer mainstream â€” millions of users became 'artists' overnight.

punchline.text: Everyone's a Van Gogh with the right filter.

quiz.question: What does neural style transfer do?
options: Applies one image's artistic style to another image's content
